select.xforms:label: Please select the WWARN modules for which this study has data...

xforms:input.xforms:label: When did the study start?
xforms:input.xforms:hint: Enter the date on which the study started, e.g., 2006-11-23.

xforms:input.xforms:label: When did the study end?
xforms:input.xforms:hint: Enter the year in which the study ended, e.g., 2008-06-30, or leave blank if the study is ongoing.

xforms:hint.p: Who was the principal investigator of this study?

xforms:input.xforms:label: Home page?
xforms:input.xforms:hint: Enter the URL of a web page that is the person's home page.

xforms:input.xforms:label: Host organisation or institution?
xforms:input.xforms:hint: Enter the name of the person's host organisation or institution.

p.em: You can add another principal investigator by clicking the "+" button below.

xforms:hint.p: Describe the site (location) where study subjects were recruited from...

p.em: If the study involves more than one site, what identifier (i.e., code) is used for this site in the submitted study data?
You can add another site by clicking the "+" button below.

xforms:hint.p: Is this study described in any published research papers?

p.em: You can add another publication by clicking the "+" button below.

xforms:input.xforms:label: When can data be put on web?

p.em: Use the "+" button below to add another regimen.

xforms:item.xforms:label: (please select if more than one regimen)

xforms:hint.p: Please complete the section below for each drug...

p.em: Use the "+" button below to add another drug.

xforms:hint.p: Please complete the section below for each treatment regimen...

xforms:item.xforms:label: (please select if more than 1 treatment regimen)

p.em: Use the "+" button below to add another treatment regimen.

xforms:group.label: What were the inclusion criteria for your in vitro study?

xforms:hint.em: For each of your sites, please complete the section below. If the details are the same for each sub-site, leave blank after the first sub-site.
Enter a code for one of the sites defined in the general questions above.

xforms:select1.xforms:label: What was the delay between sampling and testing?
What was the transport and storage temperature?

p.em: Use the "+" button below to enter information for another site.

xforms:input.xforms:label: Where did the analysis take place?

xforms:hint.em: Enter a site code, or laboratory name and address if the analysis did not take place at any of the previously entered sites.

xforms:input.label:
CO2?
Temperature should be 37°C. Don't forget to monitor the incubator system.

xforms:hint.em: Healthy erythrocytes have to be deleucocyted.
Storage temperature: 6 months at -20°C and 1 week at +4°C after using.

p.em: If you use antibiotics, please fill in the section below for each antibiotic you use.
Use the "+" button below to add another antibiotic.

xforms:hint.em: If this is different for each sample, please include this information in your raw data.
If this is different for each sample, please include this information in your raw data.

p.em: Please complete the section below for each drug stock solution used.
Storage temperature and shelf lives for each solution will be determined and indicated.

xforms:select1.xforms:label: Were stock solutions provided by WWARN?

p.em: Use the "+" button below to add another drug stock solution.

xforms:select1.xforms:label: Are your plates prepared in batches or extemporaneous?

xforms:input.xforms:label: If clone was not provided by WWARN, who provided the clone?

xforms:select1.xforms:label: Are you entering data for one or several batches of plates?
Are your batch preparation dates and 3D7 information included with the raw data?

xforms:hint.em: If batch preparation dates and 3D7 information are not included with the raw data, please complete the section below for each batch.

p.em: Use the "+" button below to add another batch.

p.b: Before filling in this section please submit clinical data and complete the clinical study questionnaire.

xforms:group.h5: How were clinical samples selected to be genotyped for molecular markers of resistance?

xforms:select1.xforms:label: Samples taken on day of treatment failure?

p.em: Use the "+" button below to add another day.

xforms:select1.xforms:label: Samples selected for genotyping molecular markers of resistance?

xforms:input.xforms:label: When were samples isolated from patients?

p.em: You can add another resistance marker by clicking the "+" button below.

select.xforms:label: How were mixed genotype resistance loci designated in the data set?

xforms:item.xforms:label: Designated as mixed (listed as mixed or both alleles reported: e.g. K/T)
Designated as mutant (only mutant allele is reported)

p.em: You can add more resistance loci by clicking the "+" button below.
You can add more loci by clicking the "+" button below.
